As the ship entered tha atmosphere a metallic black skinned female 
robot entered the room.Her face changed to suprised when she entered.

Raziel:Father Gracius!! Is that our destination?!?! Is that Earth?!?!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Yes I choose "monks" because I want them to
> resemble Tibetian monks but they wouldn't discriminate
> (may I suggest the name "Nun").
> 
> --- black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> > ooc:Female bot can be in the Monks?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > Gracius: We are the Cybertronian Order of Monks. 
> > We
> > > seek only peace.  We will obey whatever
> > regulations
> > > your masters require of us, but this is the planet
> > to
> > > which the Matrix has guided us.  We promise not to
> > > disturb history in a negative way.
> > > 
> > > Gracius waits for Cheetah to begin the
> > transformation
> > > of the ship to a base for the landing.
> > > 
> > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC:I know you'll land anyways, I'm just playing
> > her
> > > > 
> > > > Standing on the moon, Meteara's sensors detect
> > the
> > > > incoming ship. She 
> > > > calls them out on their own frequency.
> > > > 
> > > > Meteara: Cybertronian Ship, I am Meteara, second
> > > > emissary of the Vok. 
> > > > I must warn you that there are many other
> > > > Cybertronians on Vector 
> > > > Earth, and that your presence will unbalance its
> > > > stability. Therefore, 
> > > > I ask you not to land.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14"
> > <black_ben14@h...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > ooc:sorry if I moved Peg to neutral but I
> > really
> > > > wanted to play him 
> > > > =P
> > > > > so I'll make another char soon.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816"
> > > > <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > OOC: I'm sick of waiting for this post.  2
> > > > Pascifist bios are up 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > that's enough proof that the council
> > approves
> > > > for me.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > BIC:  Gracius stares out of a window as they
> > > > come out of Transwarp 
> > > > > > space.  He reconizes the place as Earth.  He
> > > > controls his surprise 
> > > > > > and appears as if he were expecting this.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Gracius:  It appears the Matrix has plans
> > for us
> > > > that may involve 
> > > > > > reordering history.  Perhaps we can end the
> > > > Great War by teaching 
> > > > > the 
> > > > > > Autobots and Decepticons of peace.  Cheetah
> > > > prepare the Peacecraft 
> > > > > > (I'm a Gundam fan and I made up the name at
> > the
> > > > last minute) for 
> > > > > > transformation.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > The ship begins descent towards a Northern
> > land
> > > > area resembling 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > Himalaya Mountains.
> > > >
